titleStmt.title: A most sweet song of an English merchant, borne at Chichester To an excellent new tune.
titleStmt.author: Deloney, Thomas, 1543?-1600, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: for Francis Coules at the Old-Bayley,

notesStmt.note: The ascription to Deloney in the Jeffes entry to this in the Stationer's Register is a J. P. Collier forgery--Cf. STC.
Suggested date of publication from STC.
In two parts; woodcuts at head of first part.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
